attributes.action: prevent the unnecessary closure of Eglwys Wen, a full & successful primary school.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cardiff City Council propose to close two very successful primary schools (which are not at all undersubscribed) and replace them with a single new school with substantially less places, ostensibly to force pupils to attend other, less successful schools in the area.  The new, overcrowded school may even be spread across two sites on opposite sides of the village.  This proposal is neither good for children's education nor is it the best way to achieve the council's stated objectives.

rejection.details: This is a matter for local government. Please contact you local MP.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
